name: Ambitious
description:
"Ambitious" is a third person puzzle solving game based on the myth system written by Lovecraft.
It tells the story of the demise of a fictional border town in Britain in the last century, as well as a deeper mystery.
Players will play different roles (or strangers) in the town in five independent chapters, and gradually spy on the origin of the town by experiencing strange events and character dialogue around them. When the five stories come together, players will thoroughly find out and be shocked by the power to destroy the town, and experience the character's ambition and redemption.
In this game, you can experience:
Multiple supernatural events.
A group drama performed by dozens of characters with different personalities and complete character arcs.
A classical English town built by exquisite pixel art.
Elaborate puzzles and CG.
Talk to the characters and interact with various objects to understand the world view of the game and the history of the town.
关于这款游戏
《镇惊》一款基于洛夫克拉夫特笔下神话体系的第三人称解谜游戏。
其讲述的是一座虚构于上世纪英国的边陲小镇的消亡史，以及更深处不为人知的秘辛。
玩家将在五个独立章节扮演小镇上不同的角色（或者异乡人），通过体验发生在他们身边诡异事件和人物对话来抽丝剥茧，逐步窥伺小镇的本源。当五个故事汇集时，玩家将彻底查明并震惊于毁灭小镇的力量，并体验角色的野心和救赎。
在这款游戏中，您可以体验到：
多个超自然事件。
几十名性格迥异、拥有完整人物弧的角色所演绎的群像剧。
精致像素美术所打造的别树一格的古典英伦小镇。
精心打造的谜题和CG。
与角色对话并和各式各样的物品互动来了解游戏所处的世界观和小镇的历史。
